entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville appeared from behind an armchair, clutching Trevor the toad.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: said Harry , hurriedly putting the Cloak behind his back.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape might even now be playing Fluffy to sleep

relationships.description: Neville stared at their guilty faces.
You can’t go out, you’ll be caught again. Gryffindor will be in even more trouble.
They couldn’t afford to waste any more time, Snape might even now be playing Fluffy to sleep.
